name: Kathmandu Durbar Square
description: A historic square featuring palaces, courtyards, and temples, showcasing the rich history of the Malla kings.

name: Boudhanath Stupa
description: One of the largest stupas in Nepal, a UNESCO World Heritage site, known for its massive mandala and spiritual significance.

name: Swayambhunath Stupa
description: An ancient religious complex atop a hill, offering panoramic views of the city and known for its monkey population.

name: Phewa Lake
description: A stunning freshwater lake known for its scenic beauty and boating activities.

name: Sarangkot
description: A popular viewpoint for sunrise and sunset, offering breathtaking views of the Himalayas.

name: World Peace Pagoda
description: A Buddhist stupa that provides panoramic views of Pokhara and the surrounding mountains.
